content: magic_ring spock was a bit lonely so he has captain kirk to keep him company now his arms legs body and head are same pattern as spock go to my ravelry store for spock s pattern materials 8/4 cotton yarn purchased at hobbii com black nude light brown and yellow color yarn 2 0 and 2 75 mm crochet hook 5 mm safety eyes sewing needle scissors stitch marker embroidery thread golden yellow color pink blush make-up abbreviations r= row rounds single_crochet= single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet increase= increase decrease=decrease slip_stitch= slip_stitch magic_ring=magic_ring chain=chain fo= fasten_off blo= back loop only s= strands tag me on instagram @handmade crochi of your creations happy crocheting
